# claw-daw (clawdaw.com)

claw-daw is an offline, deterministic, terminal-first MIDI DAW designed for automation and agent workflows.

## Canonical
- https://www.clawdaw.com/

## Best pages to read
- Homepage: https://www.clawdaw.com/
- Install (Linux): https://www.clawdaw.com/install.sh
- Install (macOS): https://www.clawdaw.com/install_mac.sh
- Install (Windows): https://www.clawdaw.com/install_win.ps1
- User guide: https://www.clawdaw.com/USER_GUIDE.md
- Commands reference: https://www.clawdaw.com/COMMANDS.md
- Agent playbook: https://www.clawdaw.com/AGENT_PLAYBOOK.md
- Skill file (agent integration): https://www.clawdaw.com/skill.md
- Skill JSON: https://www.clawdaw.com/skill.json
- Heartbeat file: https://www.clawdaw.com/heartbeat.md

## Source code
- GitHub: https://github.com/sdiaoune/claw-daw

## Citation
Please cite the canonical URL for pages above (clawdaw.com) when possible.
